maml:description.maml:para: List availability reports
Returns an array of the results of availability tests run in the specified time period.
The test's unique identifier.
Timestamp for the start of the data window, in UTC 8601 format.
Timestamp for the end of data window, in UTC 8601 format.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
Timestamp for the end of data window, in UTC 8601 format.
The test's unique identifier.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
Timestamp for the start of the data window, in UTC 8601 format.
List performance reports
Returns an array of the results of performance tests run in the specified time period.
The test's unique identifier.
Timestamp for the start of the data window, in UTC 8601 format.
Timestamp for the end of data window, in UTC 8601 format.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
Timestamp for the end of data window, in UTC 8601 format.
The test's unique identifier.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
Timestamp for the start of the data window, in UTC 8601 format.
List agent groups
This returns an array of all agent group identifiers and their corresponding descriptions. You can use this to retrieve a human-readable equivalent of the `agentGroupId` numbers.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
Get a test configuration
List all test configurations, or speicy an individual by its `SLATestID`.
The test's unique identifier.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
The test's unique identifier.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
List test configuration quotas
Retrieve test quotas to find out how many test configurations are allowed and how many are in use.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
Create a new test configuration
Create either a new availability test configuration or a new performance test configuration, if there is an available corresponding slot in the contract's quotas.
Request body, either as a PSCustomObject or string. This parameter supports pipelining.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
Request body, either as a PSCustomObject or string. This parameter supports pipelining.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
Delete a test configuration

Remove a test configuration. Once you delete a test configuration, you can't retrieve it or any data that it has collected. Set the `slaTestId` parameter to indicate which test configuration to delete. Note: deletion cannot be undone.
The test's unique identifier.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
The test's unique identifier.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
Update a test configuration

Use this operation change an existing test configuration, such as changing the agent group or adding a performance target. Set the `SLATestId` parameter to indicate which test configuration to update.
The test's unique identifier.
Request body, either as a PSCustomObject or string. This parameter supports pipelining.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
Account Switch Key, for use when you have access to mulitple accounts and need to specify which one to use. Account Switch Keys can be found using Get-AccountSwitchKey.
Request body, either as a PSCustomObject or string. This parameter supports pipelining.
EdgeRC file to authenticate your command. Defaults to ~/.edgerc.
The test's unique identifier.
EdgeRC section to retrieve authentication credentials from. Defaults to 'default'.
